page.title: Question Types Guide
page.subtitle: Learn about the different question types available in QuizCrafter
page.intro: QuizCrafter supports 6 different question types, each with specific validation rules and Canvas export behaviors.

multipleChoice.name: Multiple Choice
multipleChoice.description: A question with 4 answer options (A, B, C, D) where exactly one answer is correct.

validation.optionLength: Each option text must be between 1-500 characters
validation.questionLength: Question text must be between 1-2000 characters

multipleAnswer.name: Multiple Answer
multipleAnswer.description: A question with 5 answer options (A, B, C, D, E) where 2-4 answers are correct. Students must select all correct answers to receive credit.

validation.options: 5 options required (A, B, C, D, E)
validation.optionLength: Each option text must be between 1-500 characters
validation.questionLength: Question text must be between 1-2000 characters

trueFalse.name: True/False
trueFalse.description: A simple statement that students evaluate as either true or false.

validation.statement: Question text is the statement to evaluate
validation.correctAnswer: Answer must be true or false
validation.questionLength: Question text must be between 1-2000 characters

matching.name: Matching
matching.description: Students match items from the left column to their corresponding items in the right column. Supports partial credit scoring.

validation.uniqueness: No duplicate questions or answers allowed
validation.itemLength: Each item text must be between 1-500 characters

canvas.points: Points equal to number of pairs
canvas.scoring: Partial credit scoring (1 point per correct match)

fillInBlank.name: Fill in the Blank
fillInBlank.description: Questions with one or more blanks that students must fill in with the correct text. Supports multiple acceptable answers per blank.

validation.variations: Up to 10 answer variations per blank (include all case variants)

canvas.points: 1 point per correct blank (exact match of correct answer or its alternatives)

categorization.name: Categorization
categorization.description: Students sort items into the correct categories.

validation.itemsPerCategory: Each category must have at least 1 item
validation.distractors: 0-5 optional distractors (items that don't fit any category)
